main.name: James Caraang
main.description: Building things takes both a creative and logical mind. Through my experience as a Web Developer and Creative Entrepreneur, I've gained insights and knowledge that allows me to solve problems in creative ways.
main.bio: Programming is like fine art â€“ it takes time, practice and dedication to produce beautiful code. As a programmer with a background in music and art, I understand the challenge of articulating complex ideas in a team setting with collaborators. This pain point is my motivation for writing clean, dry, concise code that makes people shed a tear (in a good way). I am a quick learner who is highly adaptive and able to work in stressful situations, whether in a team setting or in a remote, autonomous setting. I hope to gain experience in the workplace that will allow me to showcase my communication skills and further expand my development knowledge.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description:
Worked alongside product managers as part of the UI Unification team to migrate the existing monolith architecture codebase in Angular to a micro - frontend architecture in React and Next.js, which served hundreds of businessess across Canada. 
Created unit tests and integration tests to cover technical debt accrued and increased code coverage to 90+% 
Created an internal tool for the sales team using RESTful APIs in Express.js that saved the company thousands of dollars on a monthly subscription plan.

work.title: Co-Founder
work.description:
Created a Single Page Application using MongoDB, Express, React and Node.js stack with the intent to create a subscription and music streaming platform, allowing users to download music to use in their own projects. Integration of the AWS SDK was used as cloud storage for digital assets and Stripe as payment gateway. Redux used for application state management. 
Engineered recording sessions, and produced musical sound tracks for various artists. 
Actively solicited prospective clients and used managed marketing strategies to draw a diverse client base. 
Negotiated pricing favorable to clients and company.

work.title: Software Intern
work.description:
Analyzed existing codebase to determine the functionality of the trivia game software being used by clients in the hospitality industry. 
Helped refactor and improve legacy LAMP stack codebase to a newer stack using MongoDB, Express, React and Node.js. 
Aided in building the software API to send and retrieve data from AWS. 
Developed data scraper in Python to aggregate information from potential clients all across Canada.

projects.title: Nani Beats Website
projects.category: Single Page Application using MongoDB, Express, React and Node.js stack with the intent to create a subscription and music streaming platform.

projects.title: Drum Machine
projects.category: A drum machine built with the tone.js package made to mimic the aesthetic of Ableton.

projects.title: Moody
projects.category: An image and facial recognition app that returns a playlist depending on a given image. Utilizes Amazon's Rekognition for machine learning and Spotify's API for a playlist.

projects.title: Jungle
projects.category: A mini e-commerce application built with Ruby on Rails with integration of the Stripe API for handling user transactions.

projects.title: Tweeter
projects.category: Tweeter is a a simplifed single-page Twitter clone using HTML, CSS, JS, jQuery and AJAX on the front-end, and Node, Express and MongoDB on the back-end.

projects.title: Chatty
projects.category: A single page messaging app. React used for the front end and WebSockets on the back for real-time messaging functionality.

projects.title: TODO.
projects.category: Smart to-do list app that categorizes your task into one of four categories using Bayes-Classifier and provides external links through the Google-query API.
